nodes.text: Roz was a free-trader during the Galactic Civil War. He was hired by Almera Zan to transport her group of Alliance to Restore the Republic agents to Demophon, searching for Enid Vahr. His ship was destroyed, and only he, Almera Zan, Tamarc, and Grashk survived. Roz was later shot while stranded on Demophon.
